input_text: Despite the fact that it was raining heavily, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

translations.to_spanish: A pesar de que llovía intensamente, los corredores de maratón continuaron su carrera con determinación y entusiasmo.
translations.to_english: Despite the intense rain, the marathon runners continued their race with determination and enthusiasm.

input_text: She postponed the meeting until her manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

translations.to_spanish: Aplazó la reunión hasta que su gerente, que había estado fuera en un viaje de negocios, regresara a la oficina con la aprobación final.
translations.to_english: He postponed the meeting until his manager, who had been away on a business trip, returned to the office with the final approval.

input_text: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself yearning for the solitude of the mountains.

translations.to_spanish: Mientras disfruto pasando el tiempo con amigos en la playa, a menudo me encuentro anhelando la soledad de las montañas.
translations.to_english: While I enjoy spending time with friends at the beach, I often find myself longing for the solitude of the mountains.

input_text: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without a background in physics, could understand the significance of the findings.

translations.to_spanish: El científico explicó el experimento en detalle para que todos, incluidos aquellos sin conocimientos de física, pudieran entender la importancia de los hallazgos.
translations.to_english: The scientist explained the experiment in detail so that everyone, including those without knowledge of physics, could understand the importance of the findings.

input_text: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

translations.to_spanish: Si trabajas duro y te mantienes enfocado en tus metas, lograrás más de lo que jamás pensaste posible en la vida.
translations.to_english: If you work hard and stay focused on your goals, you will achieve more than you ever thought possible in life.

input_text: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by locals, the service was slow, and the food did not live up to our expectations.

translations.to_spanish: Aunque el restaurante fue muy recomendado por los lugareños, el servicio fue lento y la comida no estuvo a la altura de nuestras expectativas.
translations.to_english: Although the restaurant was highly recommended by the locals, the service was slow and the food did not live up to our expectations.

input_text: Because she studied diligently every night for the past month, Maria performed exceptionally well on her final exams.

translations.to_spanish: Debido a que ella estudió diligentemente todas las noches durante el último mes, María tuvo un rendimiento excepcional en sus exámenes finales.
translations.to_english: Because she studied diligently every night for the last month, María performed exceptionally on her final exams.

input_text: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which, in turn, led to increased productivity across all departments.

translations.to_spanish: La empresa implementó nuevas políticas para mejorar la satisfacción de los empleados, lo que, a su vez, llevó a un aumento de la productividad en todos los departamentos.
translations.to_english: The company implemented new policies to improve employee satisfaction, which in turn led to an increase in productivity across all departments.

input_text: After the storm had passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles left behind.

translations.to_spanish: Después de que pasó la tormenta y reapareció el sol, los niños se aventuraron afuera a jugar en los charcos que dejó.
translations.to_english: After the storm passed and the sun reappeared, the children ventured outside to play in the puddles it left.

input_text: Whenever he travels abroad, John makes it a point to learn a few basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.

translations.to_spanish: Cuando viaja al extranjero, John se asegura de aprender algunas frases básicas en el idioma local para mostrar respeto por la cultura.
translations.to_english: When traveling abroad, John makes sure to learn some basic phrases in the local language to show respect for the culture.
